      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Shape rightSide)
        Compares this and another Polygon object according to areas.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Shape
        Overrides:
        compareTo in class Polygon
        Parameters:
        rightSide - takes another polygon as parameter and compares them respect to their areas.
        Returns:
        result of the comparing. If this is greater, then returns 1. if this is less, then returns -1. if they are equal, then returns 0.
